name: Naze Marine Holiday Park - Park Resorts

reviews.text: This is not my usual type of holiday but was taking the grand daughter away and wanted somewhere to keep her occupied.
reviews.title: Well done Park resorts

likes.disliked: — Nothing really but would NOT suit teenagers looking to go clubbing

reviews.text: Not much change from last years visit so on the whole great place for kids.
reviews.title: Great for family with young kids

likes.disliked: — Nothing really but would NOT suit teenagers looking to go clubbing

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Look at my pevious review, we are a tourer.
reviews.title: Lovely except for the staff ......
dan the man and team stars brilliant
reviews.text: Only had one meal there on the curry night and enjoyed that and was served very quickly this time.

aka: Naze Marine Holiday Park - Park Hotel Walton-On-The-Naze
description: You're in for an amazing time at Naze Marine! Watch the boats come in on the Naze and enjoy the superb views from the Park. Facilities include heated indoor pool with children's splash pool and adventure playground. Holiday price included beds made up for your arrival, entertainment passes and access to facilities.
